about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling adventure in Caapora Adventure: Ojibe's Revenge

Features

  • 🏞️Explore a stunning world inspired by the beauty of the Amazon rainforest

  • ⚔️Fight against creatures and entities inspired by the rich and vibrant myths and legends of Brazilian Folklore

  • 💣Discover new places by mastering new abilities such as swimming, exploding bombs, and Metroidvania-like gameplay mechanics

  • 🏹Wield a variety of unique weapons including bows, magical bombs, spears, zarabatanas, and crafted shields

  • 🧩Solve challenging puzzles in mysterious dungeons

  • 🧍Meet and interact with a cast of unforgettable original characters

  • 📜Experience an epic story that will keep you engaged and enthralled from beginning to end

  • 🎵 Immerse yourself in the game's original soundtrack that captures the spirit of the game's world and its characters.

With its unique cartoon 3D visuals, exciting gameplay, and epic storytelling, Caapora Adventure: Ojibe's Revenge will take you on an unforgettable journey through the Zaltana continent. Solve puzzles, uncover ancient treasures, and learn to wield native weapons as you explore a world filled with danger and secrets.

Are you up to the challenge of defeating Ojibe and restoring the balance of the world? Put your wits and skills to the test in Caapora Adventure: Ojibe's Revenge.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Solve many puzzles in dungeons

  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems may run the game.

Recommended:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems may run the game.
